author: becka11y
msg: fix ticket #79 and other file api cleanup

use decodeURIComponent() rather than unescape() to decode returned file contents in JS. Create actual FileError object rather than using just the code.  Cleanup of encoding types on obj. c side that allows saving non-ascii characters.  Added writer.abort() function in file.js.
